jspecview.common
Interface Graph

All Known Implementing Classes:
IntegralGraph, JDXSpectrum
public interface Graph

Interface Graph provides methods that are used for the display by the JSVPanel. Any object that should be displayed by the JSVPanel should implement this interface.

Author:
Debbie-Ann Facey, Khari A. Bryan, Prof. Robert J. Lancashire
See Also:
JSVPanel

          Error number that is returned when a min value is undefined
